getter.name: get_date
getter.description: Return arrival date of this email

getter.name: get_notes
getter.description: Return a list of notes of this email.

getter.name: get_sender
getter.description: Return a sender of this email.

getter.name: get_subject
getter.description: Return a subject of this email.

getter.name: get_recipients
getter.description: Return a list of recipients of this email.

methods.name: add_notes
methods.description: Add note to email in the currently folder.

methods.name: copy
methods.description: Copy this email from src_folder to dst_folder

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Delete this email from the currently selected folder.

methods.name: mark_read
methods.description: If is_read is true, then mark the email as read, otherwise mark it as unread.

methods.name: move
methods.description: Move this email from src_folder to dst_folder

methods.name: remove_notes
methods.description: Remove one or more flags from this email in the currently selected folder. flags should be a list of strings.

folder.name: list_folders
example: [(('\HasNoChildren',), '/', u'Boomerang'), (('\HasChildren',), '/', u'Boomerang-Outbox'), (('\HasNoChildren',), '/', u'Boomerang-Outbox/Cancelled'), (('\HasNoChildren',), '/', u'Boomerang-Returned'), (('\HasNoChildren',), '/', u'INBOX'), (('\HasChildren', '\Noselect'), '/', u'[Gmail]'), (('\All', '\HasNoChildren'), '/', u'[Gmail]/All Mail'), (('\Drafts', '\HasNoChildren'), '/', u'[Gmail]/Drafts'), (('\HasNoChildren', '\Important'), '/', u'[Gmail]/Important'), (('\HasNoChildren', '\Sent'), '/', u'[Gmail]/Sent Mail'), (('\HasNoChildren', '\Junk'), '/', u'[Gmail]/Spam'), (('\Flagged', '\HasNoChildren'), '/', u'[Gmail]/Starred'), (('\HasNoChildren', '\Trash')

folder.name: rename_folder
folder.description: Change the name of a folder
